original_title: Derby Days Lombardia: Brescia Calcio v Atalanta B.C.
overview: We head to Lombardy, Italy, for the first derby in more than a decade between Brescia Calcio and Atalanta B.C. Two clubs who share a rivalry that goes way beyond football and into every facet of local culture from the dialect to the food to the culture of war and violence in the region. Despite being provincial neighbours, different time spent in different divisions meant the two had been suffering their longest derby drought, until this season, where they would both finally meet in Serie A.
title: Derby Days Lombardia: Brescia Calcio v Atalanta B.C.
